de-DE.description:
Easy, fun and fast to use
Get a great overview with dynamic Charts and Diagrams
Classic and modern design
Automatic Currency Conversion
Invite Friends & Family to share the trip with
Share Costs and simplify transactions
Works Online and Offline

*** A 2$ purchase will be applied to your iTunes account at the end of the 1 week trial. Subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled within 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can cancel anytime with your iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription. For more information, see our ToS and Privacy Policy. ***
de-DE.promoText: Travel with friends on a budget without compromising on quality.  Start your journey and keep track on your expenses with Budget for Nomads now!
de-DE.title: Budget for Nomads
